course_description: By drawing on a wide range of materials across various disciplines the course aims to provide a broad and coherent picture of the history of modern Korea since the late 19th century to the contemporary period.
sections: Class Nbr: 2189, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: J. Medina, Status: Open
